message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.CY

Reasoning: The paper discusses a novel integrated focused crawler that collects both Web and Social Media content for a topic of interest, with a focus on improving the freshness of the collected content. This involves addressing issues related to topical and temporal aspects of the content, as well as exploiting the stream of fresh Social Media content for guiding the crawler. Based on these aspects, the most likely sub-category is Information Retrieval (cs.IR), followed by Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) and Sound and Music Computing (cs.SD). Other possible sub-categories include Computation and Language (cs.CL) and Computers and Society (cs.CY).
